name: Universe Invaders
description:
Universe Invaders

Thanks for visiting the game's page! This is my first-ever game, The game is made with the programming language Python and i decided to put all my skills into a game and i decided to upload it here, to itch.io !

In the game, you basically have to shoot monsters, if they go near you, you will lose! You also have to watch over for meteors! They come every 8 seconds and will kill you when touched with the player.

The game keeps track of your score (1 kill = 1 score) and played time (in seconds).

When you die, the game automatically restarts after a couple of seconds

That's all about it!

If you guys want i can make a discord server where you can report bugs and share your scores and so on!

Controls
  • W - move up
  • S - move down
  • A - move left
  • D - move right
  • SPACE - shoot
 Instalation help
  • Step 1 - Download from below
  • Step 2 - Unzip the rar file
  • Step 3 - Open the folder
  • Step 4 - Open the .exe file and enjoy!
Note When you close the game an  'error' will popup. It's nothing don't worry. Just click close and it will be fine.
